titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: BAYLEY III COMMUNICATION (RECEPTIVE COMMUNICATION) TOTAL RAW SCORE - Description

div.p: BAYLEY III COMMUNICATION (RECEPTIVE COMMUNICATION) TOTAL RAW SCORE is the total raw score PERSON SCORE for the Communication (Receptive Communication) sub-scale of the Bayley Scales of Infant and Toddler Development (Third Edition).
The score is in the range of 0-200.
